website_summaries.verdict: Great for creating fades and advanced styles, this comprehensive set is suitable for beginning stylists.
pros: Great for delicate trim and edge work as well as thick, coarse hair

customer_reviews.title: BaBylissPRO Volare X2 with Ferrari-Designed Engine is the Best Hair Trimmer I’ve Ever Owned.
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if the people having trouble with the built-in trim closeness adjustment have read the instructions which clearly state that one shouldn’t attach any of the guide combs without first retracting the adjustment to it’s furthest setting or it will ruin the adjustment mechanism? I’ve had Wahl and Oster, and this Babyliss Pro is beats them, and deserves it’s place amongst the elite professional trimmers. The built-in fine trim closeness adjustment is ingenious. The motor is quiet, smooth, and goes through thick, heavy hair like a hot knife through butter. Another thing they seemed to pay attention to is the size, weight, and balance, all which are just right.
customer_reviews.author: George Carlin's ‘Stuff’

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 60 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, works ... BUT obviously not sealed properly and of course stapled together because it looks like someone tried to sissor it open before I got it. Blade definitely not worth 60 dollars because it’s my 5th time trying to buy one of these and they only last 6 months before they start making loud noise or extremely hot.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you know what you are buying
customer_reviews.text: The battery died after charging as directed and it died with in one haircut. Had to keep plugged in to use. Sent that sucker back and got my $ back
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: She was thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She was absolutely thrilled, as she is studying cosmetology. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: D.E. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: turned on for a minute then blade began sticking then.just didn't move at all. Total waste of money and very disappointing considering the brand makes such good items normally. But many have had issues with this model specifically
customer_reviews.author: Zaine

customer_reviews.title: Much needed
customer_reviews.text: Un the past I had trouble finding the head for my clippers. This made it easier and faster to get. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Samantha b.

customer_reviews.title: Read users manual
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He has been cutting his own hair for years and has never had cordless clippers. Make sure to read the users manual to prevent the problems that are found in the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie George

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: They work great! I have had my buzzers for going on 4 years. (Professional use as hairstylist) the head finally broke and needed to replace ASAP. These came fast and work wonderfully! Thankful I didn’t have to buy new buzzers all together.
customer_reviews.author: smantha shepard

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Blade looks used deffinitely don’t recommend I put it on my clippers to cut my clients hair and it pulled the hair so bad! Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS Beware!!! Used equipment sold as new
customer_reviews.text: I was sold a used clipper! I’m a hairstylist and the first thing I noticed was that the packing had been opened I took apart the clippers and it was filthy and disgusting inside! I feel cheated on this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rhea

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid my wife is now my barber. Love the clippers
customer_reviews.author: Jason Frey

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: I have to question if this is a knock off brand. When I first got it, I loved it and it worked great for my husband. Fast fw 6 months later, we had to keep the cord plugged in while using them as the battery would die super quick. 1 year later we can’t use them at all. The battery doesn’t stay charged at all and even with the plug left in while using them it shuts off constantly. Very disappointed In this product as it came highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: One of the best clipper ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best clipper ever, very stronger and Battery last 2-3 days Doing haircuts none stop still keep going. Love it👍
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Vee

customer_reviews.title: Favorite clipper to use on my salon guests.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve own these clippers for the last 4 years and finally replaced the blade two months ago. They are incredible. Everyone in the salon wants to borrow them all the time because they’re so easy to use. Cordless is my favorite but if my batter runs low, I just add the cord and go on with my haircuts. With oil care after every usage, this clipper can be your best friend. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Great clippers...when the power lasts, which is literally 2 minutes. I've had my license over 17 years, and am currently the CFO of a large hvac company. I cut my disabled brother's hair, so having a cordless model seemed ideal. I'm so disappointed in these. Great idea...horrible build. I also got the Wahl Mag lite version for beard trimming. They have an awesome product. Charge lasts forever! Wish Wahl put their battery in this clipper
customer_reviews.author: 49er fan

customer_reviews.title: I've had these since 2017 They are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the Blade and how easy it is to remove; They are portable hold a good charge and are great at cutting hair. Never pulled my hair once; Ever...I bought an extra blade in case the first one breaks; may never actually need it. Worth every penny absolutely
customer_reviews.author: Michael Khora

customer_reviews.title: No problems in over 3 years of salon use!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these daily in a salon environment and has had no issues with battery life or cord problems or anything else. These are great. I will say if these were used in a barbershop with nonstop use the battery might run down during the day but common sense might tell us that also.
customer_reviews.author: R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The clipper, itself works great. The 1-star review is because of the “mm” trim-position adjustment functionality. The sliding button, which at first you think is a great idea, eventually fails and begins jumping into the next setting. Luckily, to a higher setting, so at least you don’t mess your hair up, but still annoying. For the price, not worth it; they didn’t even last one year.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Quiet, Reliable
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This is very easy to use. Cuts well. I like that that you can change the blade cutting measurement with a slide control. Very comfortable and it feels like a very high quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: CommonSense

customer_reviews.title: Not us great as it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Been in the industry for 16 years and I’m always looking and trying clippers and product. So I gave this baby a try and I was not pleased. The detachable blade teeth broke within a few cuts. The button to adjust the blade height is to tough to move freely with one finger. Battery life is horrible. The clipper felt like a cheap department store clipper that I could of purchased for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the obscure charging cable because the company won't replace it and you can't buy it separately.
customer_reviews.text: Don't lose the obscure charging cable because the company won't replace it and you can't buy it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Alyk Pliskie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!
customer_reviews.text: will Never work with babyliss again. I needed a new charging cord and they won’t sell you just the cord and I’ve looked everywhere!! Love the clipper but once they are shot there is no fixing or them replacing parts customer service sucks. And I’m also not a complainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: No replacement cords
customer_reviews.text: No replacement cords. Cords are junk and do not last. Company will not sell replacement.
customer_reviews.author: david

product_meta.title: BaBylissPRO Barberology Volare X2 Cord/Cordless Clipper and Replacement Blade (FXF811)
product_meta.description:
Style:FXF811 Volare X2 Cord/Cordless Hair ClipperPowered by the legend behind Ferrari, the BaBylissPRO Volare X2 hair clipper uses an ultra-efficient MaxLife Pro motor designed and built for BaBylissPRO in collaboration with Ferrari engineers. The precision cutting blade is titanium coated for exceptional performance. Ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip, while the high-gloss finish in Ferrari Red provides the upscale appearance you expect from Ferrari. Made in Taiwan. The BaBylissPRO Volare X2 comes with 8 comb attachments in sizes: #1– 1/8", 3 mm, #2– 1/4", 6 mm, #3– 3/8", 10 mm, #4– 1/2", 13 mm, #5– 5/8", 16 mm, #6– 3/4", 19 mm, #7– 7/8", 22 mm, #8– 1", 25 mm Brand Story: BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.

BRAND STORY
BaBylissPRO is the world’s leading producer of innovative, high-performance professional styling tools. Chosen by hairdressers, barbers, and clients everywhere, BabylissPRO styling tools are versatile and engineered to last.
